name: Trumpy Game
description:
Trumpy Game is a Episode 1 preview that lets you take control of President Trump and guide him through a series of daily routines (with hilarious consequences). It is the president’s inauguration and he must fully prepare in private for his big day – everything must go right and the public must love him!

During the game you can interact with people and help Trump make various decisions. How will the day unfold? Will Trump make the impact that he wants? Only you can decide! This game has some great humor and is a barrel of laughs!
